mapper.select:
select from sys_team t left join sys_team_member tm on t.team_uid=tm.team_uid left join sys_user u on tm.user_uid=u.user_uid where t.TEAM_UID = #{teamUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and tm.MEMBER_TYPE=#{ext1}
select from sys_team t where t.TEAM_UID = #{teamUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SYS_TEAM
TEAM_NAME = #{teamName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_INDEX = #{orderIndex},
TEAM_TYPE = #{teamType},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEAM_DESC = #{teamDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

END_DATE = #{endDate},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate},
where TEAM_UID = #{teamUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
